com.unibet.worktest.dao

Interface AccountDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountDaoImpl

    public interface AccountDao
    Interface for data access operations on database table account
    Author:
    Moupiya

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accountExists(java.lang.String accountRef)
      Returns true if account exists for the acountRef in Database table account.
      void createAccount(java.lang.String accountRef, com.unibet.worktest.bank.Money initialBalance)
      Store the account details in database table account
      void deleteTable()
      Deletes the data from database table account
      Account getAccount(java.lang.String accountRef)
      Retrieves the account details for specified accountRef from database table account

      Add transfer amount to account balance for each transaction leg

    • Method Detail

      • accountExists

        boolean accountExists(java.lang.String accountRef)
        Returns true if account exists for the acountRef in Database table account.
        Parameters:
        accountRef - the client defined account reference to check
        Returns:
        true if account exists for the acountRef in Database table account.

      • createAccount

        void createAccount(java.lang.String accountRef,
                   com.unibet.worktest.bank.Money initialBalance)
        Store the account details in database table account
        Parameters:
        accountRef - the client defined account reference to create the account for
        initialBalance - initial amount while creating the account

      • getAccount

        Account getAccount(java.lang.String accountRef)
        Retrieves the account details for specified accountRef from database table account
        Parameters:
        accountRef - the client defined account reference to get the account for
        Returns:
        an instance of Account object or null if it does not exist

      • deleteTable

        void deleteTable()
        Deletes the data from database table account

      • updateBalance

        Add transfer amount to account balance for each transaction leg
        Parameters:
        leg - TransactionLeg
        See Also:
